com.escape.games.api
Interface Timer

All Known Implementing Classes:
TimerService
public interface Timer

Interface to the timer service. Timer callbacks have these guarantees: 1. first call is delta=0,elapsed=0,last=false. occurs on a tick boundary. 2. last call will have last=true. if autoRepeat=true, this is also the "first" of the next cycle.

Author:
escape-llc

Method Summary
 void cancel(TimerCallback tc)
          Cancel the indicated timer.
 void register(TimerCallback tc)
          Register the timer.
 void reset()
          Reset all timers to full value.
 void unregister(TimerCallback tc)
          Remove the indicated timer.
 

Method Detail

register

void register(TimerCallback tc)
Register the timer. Calls TimerCallback.setConfig() to initialize settings. It will receive its first callback on the next TBT with elapsed==0.

Parameters:
tc - the timer to register.

unregister

void unregister(TimerCallback tc)
Remove the indicated timer. It does not receive any additional callbacks.

Parameters:
tc - the timer to unregister.

cancel

void cancel(TimerCallback tc)
Cancel the indicated timer. It will be removed on the next TBT, and receive a callback with last==true.

Parameters:
tc - the timer to cancel.

reset

void reset()
Reset all timers to full value. Must execute while timers are paused.
